title: Marine sediments are a major carbon reservoir

content.description:
Directions: Select the choice that best fits each statement. The following questions(s) refer to the following elements. 
(A) Carbon 
(B) Sodium 
(C) Sulfur 
(D) Phosphorus 
(E) Potassium
content.question: Marine sediments that form limestone are a major sink for this element.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
